ch0290_00_teru/0101_0701_02_10:
Let’s work hard and keep learning more about
Pokémon today!
ch0290_00_teru/7101_0701_01_10: There aren’t any wild Pokémon on Pasio, right?
ch0290_00_teru/7101_0701_02_10:
So what am I supposed to do as a member of
the Survey Corps?
ch0290_00_teru/7101_0701_03_10:
I guess I’ll start by studying the Pokémon that
Trainers on Pasio are partnered with.
ch0290_00_teru/7102_0701_01_10:
When I lived in Hisui, I got in the habit of standing
behind people without them noticing.
ch0290_00_teru/7102_0701_02_10:
I did that unintentionally to someone here on Pasio
the other day and kinda startled them.
ch0290_00_teru/7103_0701_01_10:
Whenever you battle a wild Pokémon, you should
keep your distance.
ch0290_00_teru/7103_0701_02_10:
It’s dangerous if you stand too close—their attacks
could hurt you.
ch0290_00_teru/7103_0701_03_10:
Though people in this era probably know that
already.
ch0290_00_teru/7104_0701_01_10:
Have you ever had potato mochi? I ate it a lot
in Hisui.
ch0290_00_teru/7104_0701_02_10:
It’s made of cooked Sootfoot Root that’s been
mashed, kneaded, and then grilled.
ch0290_00_teru/7104_0701_03_10:
Talking about potato mochi is making me want to
eat some.
ch0290_00_teru/7105_0701_01_10:
Do you have a teammate you can depend on,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0290_00_teru/7105_0701_03_10:
I had no idea what was going on at first, but she
taught me everything I needed to know.
ch0290_00_teru/7105_0701_04_10: I’m so glad I met her!
ch0290_00_teru/1701_0701_01_10:
Oh, there you are! There’s something I want to
give you!
ch0290_00_teru/1701_0702_01_10: I’m sure it’ll come in handy!
ch0290_00_teru/2501_0701_01_10:
Pasio’s Poryphone, Galar’s Rotom Phone, and
my Arc Phone...
ch0290_00_teru/2501_0701_02_10:
There are all kinds of phones related to
Pokémon, huh?
ch0290_00_teru/2501_0702_01_10: The Arc Phone still has a lot of mysteries...
ch0290_00_teru/2501_0702_02_10:
There are all sorts of people on Pasio. Maybe
I’ll talk to someone who knows a lot about myths
and technology sometime.
ch0290_00_teru/2511_0701_01_10:
Isn’t it nerve-racking to experience somewhere
new?
ch0290_00_teru/2511_0701_02_10:
When I first arrived in Hisui, I was really scared
and unsure.
ch0290_00_teru/2511_0701_03_10:
But as it turned out, I learned a lot and got
to meet all kinds of people.
ch0290_00_teru/2511_0702_01_10:
When you’re somewhere that’s unfamiliar, it’s
comforting to have something that you already
know.
ch0290_00_teru/2511_0702_03_10:
Whenever I saw Pokémon in Hisui—even here on
Pasio—I instantly felt at peace.
ch0290_00_teru/3001_0701_01_10:
Morning. You’re up early. I was up late,
so I’m sleepy...
ch0290_00_teru/3003_0701_01_10:
Life is complicated, but let’s cherish the time we
have and where we are right now!
ch0290_00_teru/3005_0701_01_10:
I’m so tired from running around all day... Time
for a hearty meal and a heavy sleep!
